alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 12:28AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phillips County through 130 AM MDT... At 1227 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Turner, or 23 miles west of Whitewater, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Saco, Loring, Port Of Morgan, Chapman and Sleeping Buffalo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
